doc.title: Beast of the East
doc.plot: On his way home from work one evening, David comes across a beautiful Thai woman called Bee at the edge of a forest fleeing from something terrible. He takes her to the safety of his home where he tries to help her. Bee reveals to him that she is on the run from a horrible werewolf creature that is after her. As he tries to know her better, he discovers a terrible secret. She too has been transformed into a hybrid monster, and can turn from beauty into a beast when full moon hangs in the night sky. Falling in love with her, David decides to help her and learns that the only way to beat his supernatural opponent is to become a werewolf himself
